author: James Tanner
method: Place the crayfish, onion, soy sauce, honey, sesame oil and spring onion into a pan and heat gently for 4-5 minutes. To serve, place the lettuce leaves onto a plate, pour over the crayfish mixture and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 200g/7oz crayfish, cooked,  Â¼ onion, finely chopped,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp honey,  1 tsp sesame oil,  1 spring onion, chopped,  6 Little Gem lettuce leaves,  3 lime wedges, to garnish
